data.text: 好像散户大战云顶家族
data.reasoning: Describes a perceived situation as a conflict between retail investors and the controlling family of Cloud Peak.

data.text: Kenanga Investment Bank这个独立报告呢就很坚决地认为不公平而且不合理
data.reasoning: Reports a specific finding from an independent report regarding the fairness and reasonableness of the privatization offer.

data.text: 大股东也可以跟你玩摆烂的
data.reasoning: Expresses a belief that the major shareholder can act in a way that discourages opposition.

data.text: 如果你们阻止的话我们就只能够以不派息
data.reasoning: States a potential consequence of blocking the privatization - no dividend payments.

data.text: 独立顾问的报告
data.reasoning: Refers to reports from independent advisors regarding the privatization offer.

data.text: 他们都给了拒绝建议就是不要接受这个限购的这个建议
data.reasoning: Reports the recommendation of multiple investment banks to reject the offer.

data.text: 云顶大嘛这个私有化的deadline呢是被延迟到12月1号
data.reasoning: States the revised deadline for the privatization process.

data.text: 云顶大马在这个New York那边呢宣布能不能够拿到那个casino license的关键的时间
data.reasoning: Highlights a key date related to the acquisition of a casino license.

data.text: 散户大战华尔街的这个事件呢

data.text: offer price2块35仙已经高过他们的目标价了

data.text: Kenanga Investment Bank的独立报告呢就很坚决地认为不公平而且不合理
data.reasoning: Reiterates the strong stance of Kenanga Investment Bank's report.

data.text: 公平跟合理是主要呢就是从你offer的那个价格有没有跟公司目前的股呀有相当大的距离
data.reasoning: Explains the general principle used to assess fairness and reasonableness in privatization offers.

data.text: Kenanga Investment Bank就用了DCF是现金流折算法以及SOP sum of parts
data.reasoning: Describes the valuation methods used by Kenanga Investment Bank.

data.text: 云顶大马的合理的价值区间是在3块48到3块77这个范围
data.reasoning: States the valuation range determined by Kenanga Investment Bank.

data.text: 流动性的问题
data.reasoning: Highlights liquidity as a factor in assessing the fairness of an offer.

data.text: 云顶大马的现金是强劲的资产也是雄厚的股票的流动性相对更好
data.reasoning: Describes the financial strength and liquidity of Cloud Peak.

data.text: 大股东云顶大马的大股东这个云顶集团呢就出手将2.35那边的seller排队的这个order呢一口气全部清空
data.reasoning: Reports the action of the major shareholder in buying up shares at the offer price.

data.text: 小股东能不能够靠着将股价封在2.35令吉以上迫使大股东最后提高他的收购价格呢
data.reasoning: Poses a question about the possibility of retail investors influencing the offer price.

data.text: 大股东想私有化的这个一方向目前是持有57%的比例嘛
